title: Unofficial LineageOS 18.1 brings Android TV 11 to the third-gen Amazon Fire TV Stick lineup
content:
When it comes to streaming dongles, Amazon Fire TV Sticks are some of the most popular streaming devices on the market. Amazon maintains its own fork of Android called Fire OS for these devices, which lacks Google apps and has a completely different UI than Googleâ€™s Android TV OS. If you own a 3rd generation

The post Unofficial LineageOS 18.1 brings Android TV 11 to the third-gen Amazon Fire TV Stick lineup appeared first on xda-developers.
description: You can now unlock the bootloader of your third-gen Amazon Fire TV Stick, flash a custom recovery, install Android TV 11 and much more!
